title: Large Sunny One Bed on Boerum!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Gorgeous Junior One bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. 

The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! 

***Stock Photos---Real Photos of Brand New Renovation Coming Soon

Heat & hot water included
On-Site Super
Pet Friendly!
